title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 April 2015 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:29 <DarkKnightCZ> vmassol: hi again, just wondering, what would be the best implementation of the "send test email" functionality - a) having page serving as template (so it can be translated, modified, more complex), b) using l10n string, so as simple as possible, or c) anything else?  
13:31 <vmassol> DarkKnightCZ: indeed, good question. I guess a template page would be the best  
13:31 <vmassol> (it's easy to do)  
13:32 <DarkKnightCZ> okay, great  
13:32 <vmassol> IMO it's the easiest to implement and the most flexible  
13:32 <vmassol> (easier than b) I think)  
13:33 <DarkKnightCZ> yup, and just wondering if it should have separate input for email address or if it should take the user email (the second is easier and more "user-friendly" i guess)  
13:35 <vmassol> hmm I think an input for the "to", prefilled with the user's mail address would be the best probably (a bit more work for you though ;))  
13:35 <vmassol> some user's haven't set their mail address in their profile for example  
13:35 <vmassol> \*users  
13:35 <DarkKnightCZ> okay then :)  
13:36 <vmassol> cool  
13:43 <vmassol> tmortagne: Denis has loaded the last snapshot from master and got http://hastebin.com/tenotuvase  
13:43 <vmassol> is this fixed now?  
13:45 <Denis> here is what I launch: xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-7.1-20150413.112758-85.zip  
13:45 <tmortagne> at com.xpn.xwiki.XWiki.getDocument(XWiki.java:1494)  
13:46 <tmortagne> I see getStore() at this line  
13:46 <tmortagne> so it should not be related to my changes  
13:47 <tmortagne> or at least it this build is not up to date  
13:49 <tmortagne> that line was still getStore() 5 days ago it seems  
13:50 <tmortagne> so not idea how you can end up with a XWiki instance not having a store  
13:50 <tmortagne> s/not/no/  
13:51 <tmortagne> Denis: don't you have something else before that ? looks more like a consequence to me  
13:51 <Denis> nothing  
13:51 <tmortagne> ha wait  
13:51 <tmortagne> actually looks like a cross dependency  
13:52 <tmortagne> looking a the chain of components dependencies  
13:52 <tmortagne> putting some lazy loading here and thre  
13:57 <vmassol> tmortagne: just rebuilt xwiki-enterprise and got https://gist.github.com/vmassol/9d2e86ce2a9cb231baa6  
13:57 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
13:58 <vmassol> seems caused by the quartz upgrade  
13:58 <vmassol> note that I have built only xwiki-enterprise assuming maven.xwiki.org would provide the correct built jars  
14:02 <Denis> In the meantime, I just tried 7.0.1 snapshot, and while creating a subwiki, it stays never ending on "Checking Hibernate mapping and updating schema if needed for wiki […]"  
14:03 <Denis> but the wiki get created, so a UI issue  
14:03 <tmortagne> di you try to clean your browser cache ?  
14:03 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
14:03 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:03 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
14:06 <Denis> first time I see that wiki creation screen, so no I have not  
14:27 <Pbas> Hello, to PR this issue, http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6118 and avoid a newer $columnsProperties value, I need to know if a method like  $class.get($MyProperty).getTypeProperty() exist.  
14:28 <Pbas> I want to test if MyProperty is an Boolean type.  
14:28 <Pbas> If not it doesn't matter. I will fix the issue but it won't be nice. :-)  
14:30 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:49 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki

15:59 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:01 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
16:07 <tmortagne> vmassol: scheduler error should be fixed  
16:11 <vmassol> thanks tmortagne  
16:12 <vmassol> btw and FYI I've discussed with Dan Allen from asciidoc and he's started a group to implement a real grammar for asciidoc and thus to provide an AST for us. He's also interested in having a full java impl for the parsing (he's talking with some wikitext guys about this which seem to have started such an implementation)  
16:12 <vmassol> (he was there at Devoxx FR)  
16:14 <tmortagne> ok cool  
16:14 <vmassol> no ETA though...  
16:14 <tmortagne> hope wikitext implementation won't be too eclipse oriented  
16:15 <vmassol> Actually I think it could be interesting to start a dicussion with Eclipse Mylyn guys for merging wikitext and xwiki rendering. It would make sense if we were ok to donate xwiki rendering to the eclipse foundation  
16:53 <tmortagne> vmassol: not sure we could do much with that, would need to rewrite everything with wikitext APIs  
17:07 <vmassol> the goal would be to propose a new project outside of mylyn that would group wikitext and xwiki rendering
